name: Query
환경 데이터 검색
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT AVG(temp) AS temp, AVG(humi) AS humi, AVG(co2) AS co2, DATE_FORMAT(time, '%H:%i') AS time FROM environment_data WHERE time >= DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -24 HOUR) GROUP BY MONTH(time), DAY(time), HOUR(time);";

return msg;

name: 온도 데이터
습도 데이터
CO2 데이터
Query
재배기 01 데이터 검색
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT AVG(soil_temp) AS soil_temp, AVG(soil_humi) AS soil_humi, AVG(soil_ec) AS soil_ec, DATE_FORMAT(time, '%H:%i') AS time FROM cultivator_data WHERE time >= DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -24 HOUR) AND idx = 1 GROUP BY MONTH(time), DAY(time), HOUR(time);";

return msg;

name: 토양 온도 데이터

재배기 02 데이터 검색
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT AVG(soil_temp) AS soil_temp, AVG(soil_humi) AS soil_humi, AVG(soil_ec) AS soil_ec, DATE_FORMAT(time, '%H:%i') AS time FROM cultivator_data WHERE time >= DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -24 HOUR) AND idx = 2 GROUP BY MONTH(time), DAY(time), HOUR(time);";

return msg;
